top_items.author: @shiri_shh

title.en-US: OpenClaw for local business websites automation
title.zh-CN: 用OpenClaw自动为本地商家生成网站：从Google Business抓取信息，自动生成网站，邮件发送预览+付款链接

summary.en-US: OpenClaw商业化 - 本地商家自动化服务
summary.zh-CN: 2669赞4425收藏的超高价值内容，展示OpenClaw商业化落地案例

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw商业化 - 本地商家自动化服务
top_items.suggested_angle: 询问实际转化率数据和客户对AI生成网站的接受程度

js_take.en-US: This is a solid business model. What's the actual conversion rate like—how many businesses go from 'free preview' to paid? Curious if local business owners are skeptical about AI-generated sites or if the low price overcomes that.
js_take.zh-CN: This is a solid business model. What's the actual conversion rate like—how many businesses go from 'free preview' to paid? Curious if local business owners are skeptical about AI-generated sites or if the low price overcomes that.

title.en-US: Intentionally not making setup too easy for security awareness
title.zh-CN: Intentionally not making setup too easy for security awareness

js_take.en-US: Security through comprehension is underrated. Making users understand what they're running prevents the 'copy-paste from Stack Overflow' vulnerabilities. How do you balance this with enterprise adoption where IT wants one-click deployment?
js_take.zh-CN: 「通过理解来保障安全」被低估了。让用户明白自己在跑什么能防止那种「从 Stack Overflow 复制粘贴」的漏洞。你们怎么平衡这一点和企业 IT 想要的一键部署？

top_items.author: @AnnikaSays

title.en-US: One month with Claude Code + OpenClaw, shipped apps and research pipeline
title.zh-CN: One month with Claude Code + OpenClaw, shipped apps and research pipeline

summary.en-US: OpenClaw使用体验 - 新手到生产力的转变
summary.zh-CN: 极高互动(1233赞, 2079收藏)，展示真实用户从0到1的OpenClaw使用历程

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw使用体验 - 新手到生产力的转变

js_take.en-US: That learning curve is real. What specific OpenClaw configuration changes had the biggest impact on your workflow after the first month? I've found memory file organization and skill isolation matter more than the model choice itself.
js_take.zh-CN: 这个学习曲线确实真实。第一个月后，哪些 OpenClaw 配置调整对你工作流影响最大？我发现记忆文件组织和 skill 隔离比模型选择本身更重要。
